br.uff.tempo.middleware.management
Class ResourceLocation

java.lang.Object
  Service
      br.uff.tempo.middleware.management.ResourceAgent
          br.uff.tempo.middleware.management.ResourceLocation
All Implemented Interfaces:
IResourceAgent, IResourceLocation, java.io.Serializable
public class ResourceLocation
extends ResourceAgent
implements IResourceLocation

Class representing Resource Location Service. This class is responsible for index and query from a ambient loaded Map
